document.full_text: the father of a kindergartner at sidwell friends school in washington filed a lawsuit claiming that the school's psychologist had an affair with his wife while treating his daughter.
document.title: father sues elite washington school, saying psychologist had affair with his wife
lines_and_colors: the father of a kindergartner at sidwell friends school in washington filed a lawsuit claiming that the school's psychologist had an affair with his wife while treating his daughter.
